page.title: 18Rugby League in Wigan
page.content: Rugby League is very popular in our area. This year Wigan reached the final of the Rugby League Challenge Cup and thousands of Wigan supporters went down to Wembley to watch the game. I got up at 6 o'clock to go to Wembley. I was wearing white jeans and a red jumper. We were going to watch the final of the Challenge Cup between Hull and Wigan. We caught our coach near the Gas Showrooms. It took us about six hours to get there. At 2.30pm we made our way to the stadium. We gave the man our tickets and went inside to sit down. It was a lovely view, all the Wigan fans were cheering. It was very exciting. Wigan eventually won 28 - 24 and after the match kWigan's captain Graeme West collected the cup. Junior 2, St. Mark's.
